Content:
Anyone have any good suggestions for a place they like to buy handlebars from? I know exactly what I want but am having a hard time finding enough detailed info on websites to find it. Seems like everyone is haphazard with pics or what measurements they provide.

I want either 7/8" bars or 1-1/8" center clamp tapering to 7/8" bars with 6-8" rise with the ends angling back as close to a 45 degree angle as I can get and with the ends coming back down buckhorn style.

Basically exactly like these but 2-4" less rise:




Nice to haves:

29-36" wide
Steel
Black
Not too expensive, something decent but not too fancy like Emgo OEM reproduction quality or similar would be fine.

Any ideas or leads would be greatly appreciated.

Title: Best place to buy 7/8” Buckhorn handlebars?
Author: Joel_The_Mole
